scriptLoader
============

JavaScript Loader (aka bootstrap/injector)

Install
=======
```
    $ npm install sl
```

Use
===
```
    var Loader = require('sl').Loader;
    var loader = new Loader('myApp');
    loader.load('/path');
```

Examples in test folder
